comments: all i have to say is easy "A" you dont have to buy the book just fill in the blanks on the power point notes she gives you, which are basically the test questions

Great instructor with a great deal of experience as a probation officer. She started as a deputy probation officer and is now the director!! she is very nice and extremely helpful. If u r looking to join the criminal justice work force cj 198 is the best place to begin!! you gain so much knowledge and hands on training!! never a dull moment in clas
